attribute.name: type
attribute.validValues: http://www.w3.org/TR/scxml/, http://www.w3.org/TR/ccxml/, http://www.w3.org/TR/voicexml30/, http://www.w3.org/TR/voicexml21/ plus other platform-specific values.
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the 'typeexpr' attribute.
attribute.description: A URI specifying the type of the external service. See below for details.

attribute.name: typeexpr
attribute.validValues: Any value expression that evaluates to a URI that would be a valid value for 'type'.
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the 'type' attribute.
attribute.description: A dynamic alternative to 'type'. If this attribute is present, the SCXML Processor must evaluate it when the parent <invoke> element is evaluated and treat the result as if it had been entered as the value of 'type'.

attribute.name: src
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the 'srcexpr' attribute or the <content> element.
attribute.description: A URI to be passed to the external service. See below for details.

attribute.name: srcexpr
attribute.validValues: Any expression evaluating to a valid URI.
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the 'src' attribute or the <content> element.
attribute.description: A dynamic alternative to 'src'. If this attribute is present, the SCXML Processor must evaluate it when the parent <invoke> element is evaluated and treat the result as if it had been entered as the value of 'src'.

attribute.name: id
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the 'idlocation' attribute.
attribute.description: A string literal to be used as the identifier for this instance of <invoke>. See for details.

attribute.name: idlocation
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the 'id' attribute.
attribute.description: Any data model expression evaluating to a data model location. See for details.

attribute.name: namelist
attribute.attributeConstraints: Must not occur with the <param> element.
attribute.description: A space-separated list of one or more data model locations to be passed as attribute/value pairs to the invoked service. (The name of the location is the attribute and the value stored at the location is the value.) See and for details.

attribute.name: autoforward
attribute.description: A flag indicating whether to forward events to the invoked process. See below for details.
